moves.1. e4 c5 2. f4 d5 3. Nf3 dxe4 4. Ng5 Nf6: White went to trade the knight with the black bishop.
moves.10... Qd7: This move of the queen, stop white to do so. Cause white doesn't want to lose one of the bishops.
moves.11. h3: So white tried to establish a defense for the bishop.
moves.11... Qd6: Moved the queen to avoid to be captured. (If white went for Nxg7+, then bishop would have been able to capture the queen)
moves.12. Nxf8: White did the trade that he was looking for.
moves.12... Rxf8: Capturing the knight and also providing a guard for the queen's next move (Qxf4)
moves.13. Nc3: Maybe it was better if white did castle at this move.
moves.20. Bd1: It could be a good move for the next move of white.
